title: Implement  SecureString Class to decrypt sensitve data on use
author: kmscode
body_snippet:
Reference #482 

Use the [SecureString Class](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.security.securestring(v=vs.110).aspx) to decrypt on USE (before needing the password for a connection or ext tool for example). This would keep the password encrypted in memory at all times.
